content: Today, we are pleased to announce a new 120 megawatt Bitcoin mining facility in Texas in collaboration with JAI Energy and Texas Pacific Land Corporation, one of the largest landowners in Texas with over 880,000 acres in their land portfolio and listed on the New York stock exchange under the ticker TPL. We secured a 20 million debt facility from Celsius Network and exciting news today, we've announced a new Bitcoin mining facility in Texas in collaboration with JAI Energy and Texas Pacific Land Corporation, one of the largest landowners in Texas, which is listed on New York Stock Exchange under TPL.
